TheWord.Title: To have been part of this is a privilege undeserved, To be part of you is a privilege deserved. For unto us a child is born, a child is given. The prayer I have for You, is for good. The glory of the LORD is good for Me. Only God can make it well, and His God is not with us. Think you are good, think again. As a strong man. So that this people can have a better realization of You. This is the day that I called You. Now the course of history is rewritten. What is it that makes You good? As the boys come out. If you take a step for Me, I'll take a step. This is a fat loaf. These are dreams made of.

Prophet.Commentary: Brown inner circle within a red outer circle.

BibleWord.Commentary: It is He that sits upon the circle of the earth, and the inhabitants thereof are as grasshoppers; that stretches out the heavens as a curtain, and spreads them out as a tent to dwell in (Isaiah 40:22).
He said, Who are you? And she answered, I am Ruth your handmaid: spread therefore your skirt over your handmaid; for you are a near kinsman (Ruth 3:9).

AlphabetSequence.Word: For unto us a child is born, a child is given.
The prayer I have for You, is for good.
The glory of the LORD is good for Me.
Only God can make it well, and His God is not with us.
Think you are good, think again.
So that this people can have a better realization of You.
This is the day that I called You.
Now the course of history is rewritten.
What is it that makes You good?
Houston, No, I AM a Man of authority.
If You take a step for Me, I'll take a step.
To have been part of this is a privilege undeserved, To be part of you is a privilege deserved.
